channel.title: Linux on λ
channel.description: Recent content in Linux on λ

item.title: I use Arch btw
item.description: Cover source: https://www.carmenbianca.eu/en/post/2020-01-05-big-distro/ Some years ago I switched from Windows 10 to Ubuntu as an operative system for my laptop which has been my loyal companion for more than 6 years. It was fun. Of course, switching to a Linux Distro coming from Windows can be a little tricky at the begining, but it’s just a matter of getting used to it. Soon I discovered that I felt more comfortable using it.
